home.title: Begin Your Journey to Success
home.subtitle: Follow our proven three-step journey: Discover your unique personality, unlock your perfect major match, then get personalized AI career guidance. Many students have found their path - now it's your turn.
home.step1Desc: Take our comprehensive 60-question personality assessment to understand your unique traits and strengths.
home.step2Desc: Get personalized major recommendations based on your personality profile and career goals.
home.step3Desc: Get personalized guidance and career advice from our AI counselor based on your complete profile.

features.scientificallyBackedDesc: Based on proven psychological frameworks and research
features.personalizedResultsDesc: Tailored recommendations just for your unique personality
features.careerGuidanceDesc: Connect your personality to real career opportunities
features.universityMatchesDesc: Find the perfect academic programs for your goals

home.whyChooseDesc: We combine cutting-edge psychology with modern technology to guide your academic journey
home.journeyAwaitsDesc: Join many students who've discovered their ideal academic path. Your journey to success starts with understanding yourself.
home.followPathDesc: Every successful student follows a clear path. Here's your roadmap to discovering your perfect major.
home.assessmentDesc: Begin your journey with our comprehensive 60-question personality assessment. This scientifically-backed test will reveal your unique personality type from 32 different types and help you understand your natural strengths.
home.majorMatchingDesc: With your personality profile complete, you can now access our premium major matching system. Get personalized recommendations for university programs that align perfectly with your unique traits and career aspirations.
home.aiGuidanceDesc: Complete your journey with personalized AI career counseling powered by advanced machine learning. Our intelligent counselor analyzes your complete personality profile, academic interests, and career aspirations to provide expert guidance, strategic career planning, and ongoing mentorship tailored specifically to your unique goals.
home.aiGuidanceDesc2: Our AI counselor provides 24/7 access to personalized career advice, industry insights, and strategic planning that adapts to your evolving goals and market trends. Get instant answers to career questions, detailed industry analysis, and personalized recommendations for internships, job opportunities, and skill development.
home.aiGuidanceDesc3: Whether you're exploring career options, planning your academic path, or seeking guidance on professional development, our AI counselor is here to help you make informed decisions and achieve your goals.
home.academicJourneyDesc: Congratulations! You now have a complete roadmap for your academic future. Use your personalized results and AI guidance to make informed decisions about your education and career path.
home.quote: "The best way to predict your future is to create it." - Start your journey today!
home.threePowerfulTools: Three Powerful Tools for Your Success
home.threePowerfulToolsDesc: Each tool builds upon the other, creating a comprehensive journey from self-discovery to career clarity. Start with understanding yourself, then discover where you belong.
home.step1CardDesc: Begin your journey with our comprehensive 60-question personality assessment. This is your foundation - understanding who you are is the first step to discovering where you belong in the academic world.
home.step2CardDescActive: Now that you know yourself, discover where you belong! Get personalized major recommendations that perfectly align with your unique personality and career aspirations.
home.step2CardDescInactive: Complete Step 1 first to unlock this powerful tool. Your personality profile will guide you to the perfect academic path.
home.step3CardDesc: Complete your journey with personalized AI career counseling. Get expert guidance and strategic career planning tailored to your unique goals.

login.subtitle: Sign in to continue your journey

signup.title: Create Your Account
signup.subtitle: Start your journey to finding the perfect major
signup.weakPassword: Password must be at least 6 characters
signup.joinThousands: Join thousands of students finding their perfect major
signup.passwordRequirements: Must be at least 8 characters with 1 capital letter, 1 number, and 1 special character
signup.passwordMustContain: Password must contain at least one capital letter
signup.passwordMustContainNumber: Password must contain at least one number
signup.passwordMustContainSpecial: Password must contain at least one special character
signup.passwordMustBe8Chars: Password must be at least 8 characters long
signup.googleError: We couldn't sign you up with Google. Please try again.

profile.title: Your Profile
profile.subtitle: Your personal dashboard and test results
profile.viewDetailedResults: View your detailed personality assessment results
profile.aiCounselorDescription: Access our AI-powered career counselor for personalized guidance based on your test results. Get expert advice on career planning, skill development, and academic decisions.

chat.title: AI Career Counselor
chat.subtitle: Get personalized career guidance from our AI counselor
chat.error: An error occurred. Please try again.
chat.initialMessage: Hi! I am your Major Match AI assistant. Ask me anything about majors, careers, or your personality results.
chat.placeholderText: Ask about majors, careers, or your personality...
chat.pleaseLogIn: Please log in to use the AI assistant.
chat.aiCanMakeMistakes: AI can make mistakes. Verify important information.
chat.newChatHelper: Start a conversation to see it here.
chat.emptyStateTitle: Ask anything about your academic journey
chat.emptyStateDescription: Use the message box below to ask why you matched with a major, how to prepare for it, or how your personality influences your path.
chat.renameConversationPrompt: Enter a name for this chat
chat.deleteConversationConfirm: Delete this conversation? This cannot be undone.
chat.singleConversationNotice: Your current AI chat version supports just one ongoing conversation. All new messages will continue within this thread.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password?
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a reset code.

resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your email, reset code, and new password.

paymentModal.oneTimePayment: One-time payment for unlimited access to our comprehensive major matching test
paymentModal.stripeNotConfigured: Stripe is not configured. Please choose Whish Money.
paymentModal.sendAmountToAccount: Send {{amount}} to the account below, then enter your transaction reference.
paymentModal.thankYouWhishPaymentSubmitted: Thank you! Your Whish Money payment details were submitted. We'll verify within 24 hours.
paymentModal.closeWindowOnceVerified: You can close this window. Once verified, your access will be activated automatically.
paymentModal.referenceAndSenderNameRequired: Reference and sender name are required

subscriptionStatus.noActiveSubscription: You don't have an active subscription. Subscribe to access the premium major test.
subscriptionStatus.whishMoneyVerificationNote: If you paid via Whish Money, verification may take up to 24 hours. You'll be notified once activated.
subscriptionStatus.paymentFailedUpdateMethod: Your subscription payment failed. Please update your payment method.
subscriptionStatus.subscriptionCanceledRetainAccess: Your subscription has been canceled. You'll retain access until {{date}}.
subscriptionStatus.areYouSureRevokeAccess: Are you sure you want to revoke access? This action cannot be undone.
subscriptionStatus.areYouSureCancelSubscription: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription? You'll retain access until the end of your current billing period.
